item.description:
Do you have a problem with clutter?  Join us for a meeting of The MetroWest Procrastinators and Clutterers. Find someone to help you with your clutter and learn how to help someone else with theirs. We are all in the same boat!  Come and meet others who want to beat the clutter trap!

We'll discuss some simple but effective ways to work in pairs and groups to make significant progress in decluttering.

If you intend to make it to the meeting, please put it on your calendar first (don't procrastinate!), then RSVP. Aim to be on time. We'll save you a seat. Please no no-shows! Please change your RSVP if something comes up and you can't make it.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a sign saying "Metrowest P & C"
item.name: Focus on reducing your clutter
